Source: Thomson Reuters

Description: On the heels of a landmark deal with ESPN, we talk with the Assistant VP of Marketing for USPA Global Licensing, Shannon Stilson. She provides all the details on how this new agreement will further grow a sport already on the rise. 
Short Link: https://refini.tv/3rDsFiU
